comments: Well!!!to speak truth he should not be teaching any of these networking courses...no practicals except for student who struggle with project themselves...no clear voice...useless subject taught according to market needs...need to really optimize the CS course and professor to make CS dept more better..just a suggestion..no hard feelings..

AdHoc is new topic, but he tried to teach us this subject anyway. I don\'t think this topic will be relevant for at least 5 years, so if you want to take this class then take it around 2015. His grade is not very consistent.
